Throughout his career, Marlon was known for his intense method acting style, which often involved immersing himself in his characters' emotions and experiences. Despite struggling with personal demons and experiencing a decline in his health later in life, Marlon continued to act and advocate until his death on July 1, 2004, at the age of 74.
